Daeron Targaryen (disambiguation)02742268qa596uxvroix6bmap8rgqofkiaqgb1542532014-07-22T00:44:53ZThe Dragon Demands5014364{{disambig|Targaryen, Daeron}}
'''Daeron Targaryen''' may refer to:
#King [[Daeron I Targaryen]], also known as "Daeron the Young Dragon". Eldest son of King Aegon III.
#King [[Daeron II Targaryen]], also known as "Daeron the Good". Son of King Aegon IV Targaryen, himself the son of King Viserys II Targaryen. Viserys II was actually King Aegon III's younger brother, making Daeron I and Aegon IV first cousins, and Daeron II the first cousin once removed of Daeron I.

You might also be searching for "[[Dareon]]", a minor character in the [[Night's Watch]], who has a similarly spelled (but slightly different) name.
[[Category:Disambiguations]]
